name: christopher.ahern
body:
# About

I'm a PhD candidate in the Department of Linguistics and Institute for Research in Cognitive Science at the University of Pennsylvania. My advisor is Robin Clark. 

My research investigates the relationship between language learning, use, and change through mathematical modeling.

More broadly, I am interested in how these relate to general principles of human behavior.

I can be contacted by email.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
